name: electron-reactjs-boilerplate
description: a reactJS app using electron as exe packaging
author: boly38

scripts.build:front-end: cd front-end&& npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run build&& npm run start-from-src
scripts.howto:run_setup: echo please now run: ./dist/electron-reactjs-boilerplate\ Setup\ x.y.z.exe - windows installation result will be: %AppData%\..\Local\Programs\electron-reactjs-boilerplate
scripts.package: npm run build&& npm run package:binary&& npm run howto:run_setup
scripts.test: echo windows test&& set NODE_ENV=test&& c8 --reporter text --reporter=lcov --lines 60 electron-mocha --no-sandbox --trace-warnings --exit --timeout 180000 --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/ci/*.test.js
scripts.tst: echo windows %TST% test&& set NODE_ENV=test&& c8 --reporter text --reporter=lcov --lines 60 electron-mocha --no-sandbox --trace-warnings --exit --timeout 180000 --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/ci/%TST%.test.js
scripts.ci-test: echo linux ci-test&& export NODE_ENV=githubaction&& c8 --reporter text --reporter=lcov --lines 60 electron-mocha --no-sandbox --trace-warnings --exit --timeout 180000 --unhandled-rejections=strict tests/ci/*.test.js

___doc___scripts.__doc_start__cp: chcp.com 65001 to fix emoji in console - https://github.com/electron/electron/issues/7137
___doc___scripts.__doc_start__gpu: --no-sandbox to fix 'GPU process isn't usable. Goodbye.' electron error
